channel.title: Control sequencer grid with Midi controller
channel.description:
I was playing with the sequencer controls last night, and I couldn't figure out how to connect a grid sequencer to a midi cc.
I'm thinking it could be cool to control the grid with a launchpad mini. And show what's on by light on the launchpad mini.
Is that possible? Did I miss something?

item.title: Control sequencer grid with Midi controller
item.dc:creator: @Blindsmyth Simon
item.description:
@Blindsmyth wrote:

I have a subpatch that you might wanna try out. Step Sequencer.axs (8.0 KB)

Bildschirmfoto 2016-12-10 um 17.08.02.png2500x1076 245 KB

It works with a table, like rbrt's approach but uses a different way to do the midi feedback. it might be safer to replace it with rbrt feedback module. The nice thing about using a table is that you could actually store and recall patterns

You need to either set your controller to midi notes 0-15 or offset the range with math+ / math-
What controller do you have?
